attr.title: Candle Prick
attr.desc: Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles. Simple mechanics will give way to complicated scenarios as you discover different ways to interact with the environment.
attr.inst:
The demo is included and ready to run. It's a fun preview — but **buy the full game** for the real challenge at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920700/Candle_Prick/

Once it's in your Steam library:
1. Right-click the game > **Manage** > **Browse Local Files**
2. Copy **`Candle Prick.pck`** into the **gamedata** folder
3. Delete the existing **`Candle Prick Patched.pck`** demo file — otherwise, the full game won't load properly.

Not seeing fullscreen when you launch the port? From the in-game menu, go to:
**Options** > **Options** > **Video** > **Fullscreen**
